oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EDItEUR Onix for Books XML Metadata Format Schema version 2.1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: EDItEUR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ONIX for Books Product Information Message is the international standard for representing and communicating book industry product information in electronic form. See: http://www.editeur.org/onix.html.
